page.title: 17LOCAL NEWS
page.content: Although the{Strathspey and Badenoch {Herald}covers the whole of the Spey Valley,the Editor has discovered that many stories reported happen in Aviemore,probably because continued development of the area as a tourist attraction causes{conflict}between the conservationists and the tourist industry.A recent example of these problems arose when local residents petitioned the {District Council complaining about disturbances out- side the nearby fish-and-chip shop in the early hours of the morning.They wanted the council to restrict the shop opening hours but to do so would require a licencing system which does not exist.Eventually a compromise was reached with the shop owner agreeing to close at 2am and the police offering to patrol the area regularly to keep disturbances to a minimum.
